title: The Food We Eat
description: Have you ever wondered where pizza or eggs or bagels come from? The Food We Eat informs readers about the origins of some of our favorite foods. While introducing vocabulary words, the book shows that food comes from living things, not just from the supermarket.
reviewWords: animals, bagels, cattle, cheese, food, hamburger, omelets, orange, pepperoni, plants, sauce, wheat
awareness: Manipulate Initial Sound                : Manipulate initial sounds
phonics: Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraphs ea and ee
grammar: Question Marks                : Identify and use question marks
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
